title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 2600-1.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 2600-1.1 - General

State Regulations
(a) Applicability. Except as specifically provided in this Part, the provisions of this Part apply
to any individual required to be registered as a tax return preparer under
section
32
of the Tax Law. (b) Coordination. The department may
coordinate with Federal, State, and local taxing authorities and professional
licensing or other regulatory bodies to exchange information and make
disciplinary referrals regarding the conduct of any individual who prepares a
substantial portion of a tax return for compensation, irrespective of whether
that individual is required to be registered under section
32
of the Tax Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
2600-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
